channel.title: PhoneArena - Articles
channel.description: PhoneArena.com - Cell Phone Reviews, News, Specs and Info.

item.title: Samsung asks TSMC to manufacture Exynos, gets rejected
item.description: Samsung recently asked TSMC to take on manufacturing Exynos chipsets but the latter rejected this proposition.
item.author: Abdullah Asim

item.title: Google Pixel and Mark Rober launch a satellite to capture selfies in space
item.description: Google Pixel and Mark Rober launch a satellite to capture selfies in space
item.author: Johanna Romero

item.title: Google's Gemini app partners with Associated Press for real-time news delivery
item.description: Google's Gemini app partners with Associated Press for real-time news delivery
item.author: Johanna Romero

item.title: These U.S. states and cities have the most cellular dead zones. How does your state rank?
item.description: Cincinnati is the worst city and Hawaii the worst state when it comes to reporting cellular dead zones.
item.author: Alan Friedman

item.title: Android 16 Developer Beta reveals volume panel and slider UI redesign
item.description: Android 16 Developer Beta reveals volume panel and slider UI redesign
item.author: Johanna Romero

item.title: Samsung's secretive Galaxy S25 Slim is now an open book ahead of next week's big Unpacked event
item.description: The oft-rumored Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim is pictured for the first time today, showing off its gloriously thin design in ultra-high-quality renders before an Unpacked event where this particular device is still unlikely to be fully detailed.
item.author: Adrian Diaconescu

item.title: Samsung Care+ now offers free unlimited same-day repairs
item.description: Samsung Care+ now offers free unlimited same-day repairs
item.author: Johanna Romero

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series official cases leaked, revealing a variety of colors and styles
item.description: Samsung Galaxy S25 series official cases leaked, revealing a variety of colors and styles
item.author: Johanna Romero

item.title: WhatsApp is adding new camera effects, self stickers, and quick reactions
item.description: WhatsApp is kicking off 2025 with a brand-new update that introduces new ways to interact with friends and family.
item.author: Cosmin Vasile

item.title: Light up the party with the sweetly discounted JBL Pulse 5 Bluetooth speaker
item.description: The speaker delivers great sound and comes with a mesmerizing light show, making it great for gatherings. Don't hesitate and grab one for less while the offer lasts!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: TikTok reportedly ready to go dark in the US this Sunday, January 19
item.description: According to a new report, TikTok is preparing for immediate and abrupt US shutdown...
item.author: Iskra Petrova

item.title: ChatGPT's beta feature paves the way for its future as an AI agent
item.description: OpenAI is introducing a new beta feature in ChatGPT called Tasks, allowing users to schedule actions and set reminders for the future.
item.author: Tsveta Ermenkova

item.title: Walmart is clearing out its Apple Watch Series 9 inventory with an exceptional 45mm deal
item.description: Walmart's extraordinary new "clearance" sale makes the 2023-released Apple Watch Series 9 cheaper than ever in a GPS-only variant with a 45mm case.
item.author: Adrian Diaconescu

item.title: Apple's AirPods Max headphones now scream luxury at bargain price after steep discount
item.description: The headphones offer great sound and ANC, and are now even more tempting while on sale for $149 off on Amazon. Don't wait and save!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: Newbie-friendly, fun lights, rugged phone: the Doogee Blade GT
item.description: The Doogee Blade GT puts style and futurism in a rugged phone.
item.author: Preslav Kateliev

item.title: The advanced Garmin Fenix 7 gets a sizzling-hot $269 discount at Walmart
item.description: The Garmin Fenix 7 Standard Edition is a true gem at Walmart right now, where you can save $259 on one.
item.author: Polina Kovalakova

item.title: The Galaxy S25 Ultra: in 2025, a flagship's magic is in the details
item.description: Ranting about the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is apparently one of my favorite pastimes. It turns out that this phone lives rent-free in my head, given that I'm not in the Samsung camp myself and I haven't used a Galaxy phone as a daily driver for several years now.
item.author: Sebastian Pier

item.title: At 62% off, the JBL Live 460NC sell for under $50, delivering up to 50 hours of playback on the cheap
item.description: The headphones deliver good sound and are a steal at their current price. Take advantage of this offer while it lasts!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: Elon Musk’s latest battle: the SEC takes aim over Twitter paperwork delays
item.description: Elon Musk is in some troubles.
item.author: Iskra Petrova

item.title: At $100 off, the OnePlus 12R with 16GB of RAM is the mid-range OnePlus phone you should buy
item.description: The phone delivers fast performance, takes gorgeous photos and is a true bargain. Save today!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: The next-gen CarPlay is still coming, and it could let you add iPhone-like widgets
item.description: It looks like Apple is still pushing forward with the next-gen CarPlay, even though it missed its own 2024 launch target. But when it finally arrives, we now have a pretty clear idea of what to expect.
item.author: Tsveta Ermenkova

item.title: Forget the Pixel 9 Pro: The Galaxy S24 Ultra and OnePlus 13 are the two flagships I recommend as a bargain expert
item.description: The Galaxy S24 Ultra, OnePlus 13, and Pixel 9 Pro are all discounted right now, but I only recommend the first two options right now. Check out why right here.
item.author: Polina Kovalakova

item.title: In my opinion, as a savings expert, the Galaxy Tab S6 Lite (2024) offers even greater value at this price
item.description: The slate packs a punch, comes with an included S Pen, and is now even more affordable than usual, making it a true bargain. Don't wait — save today!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: First details about Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8s Elite chipset leak
item.description: Qualcomm is developing a new high-end chipset that will be positioned below the Snapdragon 8 Elite (and even the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3).
item.author: Cosmin Vasile

item.title: Leaked Zenfone 12 Ultra specs suggest it's ready to take on the Galaxy S25 Ultra
item.description: The Zenfone 12 Ultra has appeared on Geekbench, revealing its processor.
item.author: Iskra Petrova

item.title: Samsung adopts the Apple playbook for foldable iPhone display crease
item.description: It'll wait and see.
item.author: Daniel Petrov

item.title: The wait is over: Honor Magic 7 Pro officially launches worldwide
item.description: When Honor unveiled the Magic 7 Pro in China back in October, it stirred the smartphone pan as a potential Android flagship contender. Now, two and a half months later, the wait is over.
item.author: Mariyan Slavov

item.title: A 6,600 mAh Battery Phone That Looks Good? Meet the Honor Magic 7 Lite
item.description: If you’re in the market for a stylish, long-lasting phone that can handle a tumble or two, the Honor Magic 7 Lite is definitely worth your attention.
item.author: Mariyan Slavov

item.title: The second-gen of the most affordable flip foldable lands with a new look
item.description: Nubia's Flip 2 foldable smartphone has officially landed in Japan, marking the company's second entry into the foldable market. The most noticeable update in this model is the cover screen.
item.author: Tsveta Ermenkova

item.title: Disappointed by the Galaxy S25 series specs? Here are four big reasons to be excited instead!
item.description: Because you probably have plenty of reasons to be disappointed or underwhelmed by the recently leaked specs of the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra, I offer you today four big reasons to be happy with Samsung's next-gen powerhouses instead.
item.author: Adrian Diaconescu

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: How to watch and what to expect from the Galaxy S25 event?
item.description: Here's how to watch and what to expect from the upcoming Galaxy S25 event on January 22!
item.author: Iskra Petrova

item.title: As a deal hunter, I'd snag the Galaxy Watch 6 at 50% off if I were in the market for a smartwatch
item.description: The watch is loaded with features, has a sleek design and is a true bargain at its current price. So, act fast and grab one today!
item.author: Preslav Mladenov

item.title: Extremely loud, the JBL Xtreme 4 drops to a new all-time low at Amazon
item.description: The JBL Xtreme 4 has received a surprisingly good discount at Amazon! You can now save 29% on one in several available colors. Don't miss out.
item.author: Polina Kovalakova

item.title: This OG flagship gets its Android 15 update, though star features are left out
item.description: Despite this, the update (currently being rolled out in India) brings significant upgrades to the device’s performance, visuals, and user experience. Among the additions are cool animation effects for smooth multi-app switching.
item.author: Sebastian Pier

item.title: iPhones get customizable widgets and easy access to Opera's AI assistant
item.description: Opera just made using Aria even easier – no sign-in required! Plus, Opera for iOS now offers customizable home screen widgets, letting you quickly access essentials like search, tabs, and, of course, Aria.
item.author: Tsveta Ermenkova

item.title: The official store launches another Lenovo Tab Plus promo that's hard to pass up
item.description: If you're looking for a budget-friendly Android 14 tablet with excellent audio, grab the Lenovo Tab Plus! This buddy with 256GB of storage is $77 off at the Lenovo Store right now, offering even more value for money.
item.author: Polina Kovalakova

item.title: Limited-time sale brings the Galaxy S24 to a $150 cheaper price on Amazon
item.description: For a limited time, Amazon lets you save $150 on the Galaxy S24 with 256GB of storage. Get one and save!
item.author: Polina Kovalakova

item.title: Here's how to get your hands on Galaxy S25 before anyone else
item.description: The Galaxy S25 will go on sale more than two weeks after its unveiling, but not everyone has to wait that long.
item.author: Anam Hamid

item.title: Samsung Foundry, like TSMC, plans to build 2nm chips in the U.S.
item.description: Samsung Foundry plans on building 3nm and 2nm chips inside a fab it is building in Tyler, Texas.
item.author: Alan Friedman

item.title: Samsung lowers the heat by switching to third-party supplier for Galaxy S25 RAM chip
item.description: Samsung is replacing its own 13nm RAM chips on the Galaxy S25 line with Micron's 12nm RAM component.
item.author: Alan Friedman

item.title: Is Samsung ignoring the one thing Galaxy S25 Ultra users actually want?
item.description: As Samsung ramps up the AI hype ahead of the Galaxy S25 Ultra launch, it seems to ignore the one key feature users actually want to see improved...
item.author: Victor Hristov

item.title: T-Mobile is no longer letting you decide which app to use
item.description: T-Mobile is officially asking people to delete the legacy app.
item.author: Anam Hamid

item.title: Two capable mid-range 5G Galaxy handsets are coming to Boost at prices that won't bust you
item.description: Boost Mobile is adding two capable low-priced mid-range Galaxy phones to its lineup.
item.author: Alan Friedman

item.title: Leaked Galaxy S25 promotional images show off Samsung’s newest phones ahead of launch
item.description: Galaxy S25 promotional images have been leaked, giving us a very clear glimpse at the upcoming phones and what Samsung is prioritizing for them.
item.author: Abdullah Asim

item.title: Android co-founder says "it's always funny" to hear Bill Gates "whine about losing mobile to Android"
item.description: It's the little pleasures of life that often keep us going. Of course, there are also the big pleasures in life: unforgettable milestones of joy that linger for decades in our hearts and minds. Then, there's this, something in between, I guess.
item.author: Sebastian Pier

item.title: Motorola's 2025 Moto G and Moto G Power handsets are here to take the US bang-for-buck crown
item.description: The decidedly feature-packed and surprisingly good-looking Motorola Moto G (2025) and Moto G Power (2025) are officially set for their commercial US releases in the next few weeks at amazingly low prices of $199.99 and $299.99 respectively.
item.author: Adrian Diaconescu

item.title: 12,000 iPhone 16 units have entered Indonesia despite the sales ban
item.description: Well, well, well: despite being banned for sale in Indonesia, the iPhone 16 is finding its way into the country, as it turns out!
item.author: Sebastian Pier

item.title: PhoneArena launches new Review Ratings page: compare your favorite phones here
item.description: PhoneArena's new Review Rating hub page lets you easily compare your favorite phones and see their rankings across a number of categories...
item.author: Victor Hristov

item.title: You want an S Pen? The Galaxy S25 Ultra remains your best bet, even with downgrades
item.description: Reportedly, the Galaxy S25 Ultra's S Pen won't support Bluetooth, which means it loses features like remote control for actions at a distance and air gestures for device control. A bit of a bummer for many, I know. Still, if you're looking for a flagship phone with an S Pen, the Galaxy S25 Ultra remains your best bet.
item.author: Tsveta Ermenkova

item.title: Slimmest foldable may launch with blood pressure monitoring watch sidekick
item.description: The Oppo Watch 2 may join the limited ranks of blood pressure measuring smartwatches.
item.author: Daniel Petrov
